title: The everlasting gospel Apocalyps 14 : and they sung a new song before the throne, and before the four beasts and the elders, ver. 24 and no man could learn that song, but the 144, &c.
author: Eleanor, Lady, d. 1652.
notes: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Attributed to Lady Eleanor. cf. NUC pre-1956.
